subject: re:Don't have time to visit local drug store
body:
Dear customer.
Various medical associations warn us about the growing problem of drug falsification. If you want to know how to avoid being sold fake medications, red this letter to the end.
Most online drugstores sell low-quality drugs manufactured at underground factories in Latin America and Asia. These drugs prove to be really dangerous for your health. CanadianPharmacy is not like that. Don't run risks purchase 100% generic medications at CanadianPharmacy.
Don't look for prices lower than those at CanadianPharmacy anything that is cheaper is a fake.
Best regards,Marlon Cantu
